snippet: Roland Scahill was arraigned on charges of a fraudulent investment scheme, promoting a supposed production about Kathleen Battle starring Lupita Nyong’o....
abstract: Manhattan district attorney's office charges former theater agent Roland Scahill with defrauding investors of $165,0000 with promise of one-woman Broadway show, non-existent production that he claimed would star Oscar winner Lupita Nyong'o.
lead_paragraph: Roland Scahill was arraigned on charges of a fraudulent investment scheme, promoting a supposed production about Kathleen Battle starring Lupita Nyong’o.

headline.main: Ex-Theater Agent Charged With Raising $165,000 for Fake Broadway Play
headline.print_headline: Officials Say Man Raised $165,000 for Fake Play
